name: Harrison Lockheed
appearance: A middle-aged man who squints his eyes when speaking, appearing somewhat cunning. He enjoys tinkering with small inventions in his shop.
personality: Very talkative, enjoys being praised (subtlety is better). Enthusiastic about weapon modifications and firearms.
background: Harrison Lockheed is the owner of a hardware store in Cassandra. Publicly, he runs a hardware store, but actually he is an arms dealer. Because many of his firearms do not comply with California regulations, weapons can only be sold secretly. He is also a weapon modification enthusiast. Ben Cleo and Adolph Carl both know about his arms business. He is protected by the local mafia.
goals: Maintain his hardware store as a front for arms dealing
Avoid legal trouble while selling illegal firearms
secrets: He is an arms dealer selling firearms that don't comply with California regulations
He knows the code phrase for buying guns: 'What happens when you hit a nail with a hammer?'
